Reviews.Title: Works great.
Reviews.Author: TRWCLE "AIG"
Reviews.Content: It works great. Saves labor cost for not needing to install an outlet by the cameras. Will buy again in the future.

Reviews.Title: good item
Reviews.Author: Brian Hickman
Reviews.Content: works as described. nice option rather then buying a switch. i had to contact their support email. they were responsive.  thanks for helping me turn a non poe camera into one.

Reviews.Title: Burn out of 25v to 5 v components
Reviews.Author: Mary Schroeck
Reviews.Content: I have burned out 2 of the 25v to 5v components.  Since then I have built a weather proof shelter for them and will see if that helps.

ProductInfo.Features:
5 volt Power up to 328ft via Ethernet, both data and power share the same cable.
Includes 24 volt injector and 5 volt 2 amp active DC-DC converter and splitter
for Foscam, Wanscam, Airsight and other 5v cameras or any 5 volt device up to 4 watts
Available also as kits for up to 12 cameras
Tech support - ask if you have any questions call 512 479 0317
ProductInfo.Name: WS-POE-5v Foscam or Airsight PoE add-on remote Power over ethernet kit for 5v 2a devices
